SELECT u.ID as userId, u.realname as USERNAME, u.EMAIL FROM sys_users u
LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON u.ID = ur.USER_ID
AND ur.ROLE_ID = #{id}
AND u.ID NOT IN (SELECT u.ID AS user_id FROM sys_users u LEFT JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON u.ID = ur.USER_ID WHERE ur.ROLE_ID= #{id})

select p.ID as permissionId, p.PERMISSION_CODE, p.DESCRIPTION as permissionDescription from sys_permissions p
left join sys_roles_permissions rp on rp.PERMISSION_ID=p.ID
AND rp.ROLE_ID = #{id}
AND p.ID NOT IN (SELECT r.ID AS permission_id FROM sys_permissions r LEFT JOIN sys_roles_permissions rp ON r.ID = rp.PERMISSION_ID WHERE rp.ROLE_ID= #{id})
